pages.text: $(li)Dragon Breath is a essencial ingredient for Potions.$(br)$(li)This item can be used to transform Splash Potions into Lingering Potions in a Brewing Stand.

$(li)It can be used to craft an Acidian Lantern or Lingering Potion Bottle in a Crafting Table too.$(br)$(li)The Dragon's Breath can be only obtained by scooping up the Ender Dragon's breath attack or the purple effect clouds caused by they fireballs in an empty Glass Bottle.
